title: This Is Why You Can’t Wait Until Later | by Ryan Holiday | May, 2023 | Medium
content: Member-only story Ryan Holiday Follow -- 94 Share At 6:45pm on Wednesday, April 23rd, 2014, I got an email from my friend Seth Roberts, the pioneering and peerless scientist. I opened it, saw that it was to be the first of a long awaited column called “Personal Science” for the Observer, where I was then an editor.
